data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Elsayed, Ayman Khamis, Yukawa, Junichi, Tokuda, Makoto (2018): A taxonomic revision and molecular phylogeny of the eastern Palearctic species of the genera Schizomyia Kieffer and Asteralobia Kovalev (Diptera, Cecidomyiidae, Asphondyliini), with descriptions of five new species of Schizomyia from Japan. ZooKeys 808: 123-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.808.29679, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.808.29679
